verses.verse: In the <S%H7969>third<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of the <S%H4438>reign<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> unto <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and <S%H6696>besieged<s%> it.

And the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> into his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, with <S%H7117>part<s%> of the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>: which he <S%H935>carried<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8152>Shinar<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H430>god<s%>; and he <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> into the <S%H214>treasure<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H430>god<s%>.

¶ And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto <S%H828>Ashpenaz<s%> the <S%H7227>master<s%> of his <S%H5631>eunuchs<s%>, that he should <S%H935>bring<s%> certain of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and of the <S%H4410>king's<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%>, and of the <S%H6579>princes<s%>;

<S%H3206>Children<s%> in whom was no <S%H3971%H3971>blemish<s%>, but <S%H2896>well<s%> <S%H4758>favoured<s%>, and <S%H7919>skilful<s%> in all <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>, and <S%H3045>cunning<s%> in <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>, and <S%H995>understanding<s%> <S%H4093>science<s%>, and such as had <S%H3581>ability<s%> in them to <S%H5975>stand<s%> in the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1964>palace<s%>, and whom they might <S%H3925>teach<s%> the <S%H5612>learning<s%> and the <S%H3956>tongue<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H4487>appointed<s%> them a <S%H3117%H3117>daily<s%> <S%H1697>provision<s%> of the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H6598>meat<s%>, and of the <S%H3196>wine<s%> which he <S%H4960>drank<s%>: so <S%H1431>nourishing<s%> them <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, that at the <S%H7117>end<s%> thereof they might <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>.
Now among these were of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, <S%H1840>Daniel<s%>, <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%>, <S%H4332>Mishael<s%>, and <S%H5838>Azariah<s%>:

Unto whom the <S%H8269>prince<s%> of the <S%H5631>eunuchs<s%> <S%H7760>gave<s%> <S%H8034>names<s%>: for he <S%H7760>gave<s%> unto <S%H1840>Daniel<s%> the name of <S%H1095>Belteshazzar<s%>; and to <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%>, of <S%H7714>Shadrach<s%>; and to <S%H4332>Mishael<s%>, of <S%H4335>Meshach<s%>; and to <S%H5838>Azariah<s%>, of <S%H5664>Abed-nego<s%>.

¶ But <S%H1840>Daniel<s%> <S%H7760>purposed<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart<s%> that he would not <S%H1351>defile<s%> himself with the <S%H6598>portion<s%> of the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H6598>meat<s%>, nor with the <S%H3196>wine<s%> which he <S%H4960>drank<s%>: therefore he <S%H1245>requested<s%> of the <S%H8269>prince<s%> of the <S%H5631>eunuchs<s%> that he might not <S%H1351>defile<s%> himself.
Now <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H5414>brought<s%> <S%H1840>Daniel<s%> into <S%H2617>favour<s%> and tender <S%H7356>love<s%> <S%H6440>with<s%> the <S%H8269>prince<s%> of the <S%H5631>eunuchs<s%>.

And the <S%H8269>prince<s%> of the <S%H5631>eunuchs<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1840>Daniel<s%>, I <S%H3373>fear<s%> my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, who hath <S%H4487>appointed<s%> your <S%H3978>meat<s%> and your <S%H4960>drink<s%>: for why should he <S%H7200>see<s%> your <S%H6440>faces<s%> worse <S%H2196>liking<s%> than the <S%H3206>children<s%> which are of your <S%H1524>sort<s%>? then shall ye make me <S%H2325>endanger<s%> my <S%H7218>head<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%>.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H1840>Daniel<s%> to <S%H4453>Melzar<s%>, whom the <S%H8269>prince<s%> of the <S%H5631>eunuchs<s%> had <S%H4487>set<s%> over <S%H1840>Daniel<s%>, <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%>, <S%H4332>Mishael<s%>, and <S%H5838>Azariah<s%>,

<S%H5254>Prove<s%> thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>, I beseech thee, <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>; and let them <S%H5414>give<s%> us <S%H2235>pulse<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%>, and <S%H4325>water<s%> to <S%H8354>drink<s%>.

Then let our <S%H4758>countenances<s%> be looked <S%H7200>upon<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee, and the <S%H4758>countenance<s%> of the <S%H3206>children<s%> that <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H6598>portion<s%> of the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H6598>meat<s%>: and as thou <S%H7200>seest<s%>, <S%H6213>deal<s%> with thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>.
So he <S%H8085>consented<s%> to them in this <S%H1697>matter<s%>, and <S%H5254>proved<s%> them <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>.

And at the <S%H7117>end<s%> of <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> their <S%H4758>countenances<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> <S%H2896>fairer<s%> and <S%H1277>fatter<s%> in <S%H1320>flesh<s%> than all the <S%H3206>children<s%> which did <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H6598>portion<s%> of the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H6598>meat<s%>.
Thus <S%H4453>Melzar<s%> took <S%H5375>away<s%> the portion of their <S%H6598>meat<s%>, and the <S%H3196>wine<s%> that they should <S%H4960>drink<s%>; and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H2235>pulse<s%>.

¶ As for these <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3206>children<s%>, <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H4093>knowledge<s%> and <S%H7919>skill<s%> in all <S%H5612>learning<s%> and <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>: and <S%H1840>Daniel<s%> had <S%H995>understanding<s%> in all <S%H2377>visions<s%> and <S%H2472>dreams<s%>.

Now at the <S%H7117>end<s%> of the <S%H3117>days<s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%> had <S%H559>said<s%> he should <S%H935>bring<s%> them in, then the <S%H8269>prince<s%> of the <S%H5631>eunuchs<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> them in <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1696>communed<s%> with them; and among them all was <S%H4672>found<s%> none like <S%H1840>Daniel<s%>, <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%>, <S%H4332>Mishael<s%>, and <S%H5838>Azariah<s%>: therefore <S%H5975>stood<s%> they <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>.

And in all <S%H1697>matters<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H998>understanding<s%>, that the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1245>inquired<s%> of them, he <S%H4672>found<s%> them ten <S%H6235>times<s%> <S%H3027>better<s%> than all the <S%H2748>magicians<s%> and <S%H825>astrologers<s%> that were in all his <S%H4438>realm<s%>.
And <S%H1840>Daniel<s%> continued even unto the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H3566>Cyrus<s%>.
